name: Haunted Mirror
description:
Face yourself!! while seeking glory in a vast dungeon, you enter a strange room, a room where you can feel the power of black magic all around you... you start to feel dizy and several ethereal copies of yourself start apearing. Fight them as long as you can, but you'll never leave the haunted mirror.

Game made in 6 hours more or less, for a gamejam hosted at my university
